source:
TEXT_FESEST302_02422_SEQ_00Nonotta wants you to keep the truth of the eggshilaration system a secret, cross your heart and hope to die.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.
target:
TEXT_FESEST302_02422_SEQ_00※本クエストは、期間限定のクエストとなります。

ハーストミルのノノッタは、冒険者に秘密を守ると約束してほしいようだ。

source:
TEXT_FESEST302_02422_SEQ_01You promise Nonotta not to reveal the eggshilaration system's true nature to Jihli. Her mind set at ease, she turns her attention back to the festivities, and directs you to speak with her fellow Dreamer Motte when you are ready to ride on eggback.

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.
target:
TEXT_FESEST302_02422_SEQ_01※本クエストは、シーズナルイベント開催中にかぎり、
　受注、進行できます。
　開催期間終了後は進行できませんので、ご注意ください。
　期間等の詳細についてはLodestoneをご覧ください。

ノノッタと、エッグシステムの秘密をジリに言わないと約束をして、エッグシステムに乗せてもらえることになった。準備ができたら、「モット」に話しかけよう。

source:
TEXT_FESEST302_02422_SEQ_02Motte gives you a rundown of the eggshilaration system's functionality, namely how to launch the shockobo. Hop on the egg now and use the shockobo on Nonotta.

※Speak with Motte at Hyrstmill to ride the eggshilaration system.
target:
TEXT_FESEST302_02422_SEQ_02モットと話した。試しに、エッグシステムに騎乗した状態で、「ノノッタ」に「チョコボ人形」を使い、驚かそう。

※ハーストミルにいる「モット」に話しかけると「エッグシステム」に騎乗できます。

source:
TEXT_FESEST302_02422_SEQ_03You use the shockobo on Nonotta, and it proves effective even on its creator, who shrieks out loud for the fright. Unfortunately, that effect was lost on Jihli, a result which has left Nonotta disheartened. For now, do your part in the festivities by seeking out three festival participants in the Twelveswood and startling them with the shockobo. Once you have three shock eggs for your troubles, deliver them to Nonotta.

※Speak with Motte at Hyrstmill to ride the eggshilaration system.
target:
TEXT_FESEST302_02422_SEQ_03ノノッタを驚かした。エッグシステムは、彼女が自分でも驚くほどいい出来らしいが、ジリからは特に反応がなかったという。ノノッタによると、エッグハントの参加者を驚かすことで貰える、をたくさん集めると、豪華な景品と交換できるようだ。まずは、エッグシステムに乗った状態で、森の中にいるエッグハント参加者に「チョコボ人形」を使って驚かし、「」を3つ集めよう。

※ハーストミルにいる「モット」に話しかけると「エッグシステム」に騎乗できます。

source: TEXT_FESEST302_02422_SEQ_04<tab>You have startled three people and earned three shock eggs. Take them back to Nonotta at Hyrstmill.
target: TEXT_FESEST302_02422_SEQ_04<tab>参加者を驚かし、<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8C8601 /var>を3つ集めた。ハーストミルにいる「ノノッタ」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8C8601 /var>」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_FESEST302_02422_SEQ_05<tab>No sooner do you hand Nonotta the eggs than the three people you received them from come running up. In excited and appreciative tones, they tell of a rock-riding spriggan that gave them the shock of their lives. The news leaves Nonotta puzzled and perturbed, as spriggans aren't part of the plan. The creature in question has since headed to Gridania, and it seems likely that trouble will follow...
target: TEXT_FESEST302_02422_SEQ_05<tab>ノノッタに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8C8601 /var>を渡した。先ほど驚かした3人から、大きな石に乗ったスプリガンの話を聞いたが、ノノッタは、スプリガンについての心当たりはないらしい。大きな石に乗ったスプリガンは、グリダニアに向かったという……。

source: TEXT_FESEST302_02422_SEQ_06<tab>
target: TEXT_FESEST302_02422_SEQ_06<tab>

source: TEXT_FESEST302_02422_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Motte.
target: TEXT_FESEST302_02422_TODO_00<tab>モットと話す

source: TEXT_FESEST302_02422_TODO_01<tab>Ride the eggshilaration system and launch the shockobo at Nonotta.
target: TEXT_FESEST302_02422_TODO_01<tab>エッグシステムに騎乗してノノッタにチョコボ人形を使う

source: TEXT_FESEST302_02422_TODO_02<tab>Ride the eggshilaration system and launch the shockobo at festival participants.
target:
TEXT_FESEST302_02422_TODO_02エッグシステムに騎乗して参加者にチョコボ人形を使い
を集める

source: TEXT_FESEST302_02422_TODO_03<tab>Deliver the shock eggs to Nonotta.
target: TEXT_FESEST302_02422_TODO_03<tab>ノノッタに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8C8601 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_FESEST302_02422_NONOTTA_000_000<tab>So, I take it you'll keep the eggshilaration system's true nature a secret?
target:
TEXT_FESEST302_02422_NONOTTA_000_000エグ、エグ、エ～グ、エッグラホ♪
冒険者さん、ジリちゃんに「エッグシステム」の秘密、
言わないって約束してくれる？

source: TEXT_FESEST302_02422_NONOTTA_000_001<tab>You've put my mind at ease! With that settled, let's get you on eggback, shall we? Motte yonder will assist you; let her know when you are ready.
target:
TEXT_FESEST302_02422_NONOTTA_000_001ありがとう、冒険者さん！
じゃあ、「エッグシステム」に乗せてあげるから、
準備ができたら「モット」ちゃんに話しかけてね！

source: TEXT_FESEST302_02422_MOTTE_000_010<tab>You wish to ride the eggshilaration system? But of course!
target:
TEXT_FESEST302_02422_MOTTE_000_010エ～グ、エ～グ、エッグルリンッ♪
「エッグシステム」に乗るの？
それじゃ、モットが乗せてあげる！

source: TEXT_FESEST302_02422_MOTTE_000_011<tab>Hop on, and you should see a button. That's for launching the shockobo, a lifelike, shock-inducing chocobo doll. Why don't you try using it now on Nonotta? She won't mind, trust me!
target:
TEXT_FESEST302_02422_MOTTE_000_011上に乗ったら、そのへんにあるボタンをポチっとすると、
「チョコボ人形」が飛び出るわ。
試しに「ノノッタ」へ、ポコっと当ててきちゃって！

source: TEXT_FESEST302_02422_SYSTEM_000_012<tab>Launch the shockobo at Nonotta to give her a fright. The action can be selected from the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>pet hotbar<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_FESEST302_02422_SYSTEM_000_012「ノノッタ」に、
EXホットバーから「チョコボ人形」を使ってみましょう。

source: TEXT_FESEST302_02422_NONOTTA_000_015<tab>Motte yonder will help you onto the eggshilaration system; let her know when you are ready.
target:
TEXT_FESEST302_02422_NONOTTA_000_015冒険者さん、どうしたの？
「エッグシステム」に乗るなら、
「モット」ちゃんに話しかけてほしいですぅ～！

source: TEXT_FESEST302_02422_NONOTTA_000_020<tab>Uwaaah! Oh, my goodness... The shockobo never fails to work on me, and it's <var 1A 02 /var>my<var 1A 01 /var> brainchild.
target:
TEXT_FESEST302_02422_NONOTTA_000_020わぁっ！　やっ、やっぱり、ビックリするなぁ！
頑張って作ったかいがありますぅ～。
……ジリちゃんも驚いてくれたら嬉しかったんだけど。

source: TEXT_FESEST302_02422_NONOTTA_000_021<tab><sigh> If only it worked half as well on Jihli... When we used it on her, she simply chuckled and said, “Such a sense of humor the Archons must have had!”
target:
TEXT_FESEST302_02422_NONOTTA_000_021ジリちゃんからは、いい反応がなくて、
「賢者様は、とってもユーモアがあるのね！」
……って、言ってきたんですぅ～。

source: TEXT_FESEST302_02422_NONOTTA_000_022<tab>Ack, but I shouldn't complain. Suffice it to say none of this is for Jihli's ears.
target:
TEXT_FESEST302_02422_NONOTTA_000_022あっ、ごめんなさい、冒険者さん！
いまノノッタが愚痴ってたことも、内緒ね！

source: TEXT_FESEST302_02422_NONOTTA_000_023<tab>At any rate, the show must go on. And from this point on, your role in the festivities begins in earnest.
target:
TEXT_FESEST302_02422_NONOTTA_000_023それじゃあ、今からが本番だよ！
森の中に、お祭りの参加者がいるから、
「チョコボ人形」を当てて、驚かせて！

source: TEXT_FESEST302_02422_NONOTTA_000_024<tab>Festival participants are scattered throughout the Twelveswood. Find them and startle them silly with the shockobo. In return they'll give you shock eggs, which you can exchange for unique prizes.
target:
TEXT_FESEST302_02422_NONOTTA_000_024驚かされた人がくれる「」をたくさん集めれば、
とっても豪華な景品と交換できますぅ～！

source: TEXT_FESEST302_02422_NONOTTA_000_025<tab>To begin with, try startling, say, three people. When you have their eggs, bring them back to me.
target:
TEXT_FESEST302_02422_NONOTTA_000_025それじゃ、まずは3人を驚かせて、
「」を集めたら、
「ノノッタ」のところに持ってきてね！

source: TEXT_FESEST302_02422_NONOTTA_000_026<tab>Ah, the very image of Jihli's vision! Now, you handle the egg like an Archon, but how well can you handle the shockobo?
target:
TEXT_FESEST302_02422_NONOTTA_000_026わぁ！　ばっちり「エッグシステム」に乗れてるね！
そうしたら、中から「チョコボ人形」が出てくるから、
「ノノッタ」に見せてくれる？

source: TEXT_FESEST302_02422_MOTTE_000_030<tab>Oh? Fell off the egg, did you? Never you mind─given the shape, it's bound to happen. Here, let me help you back on.
target:
TEXT_FESEST302_02422_MOTTE_000_030あれっ、「エッグシステム」から降りちゃった？
それじゃ、もう一回乗せてあげるね！
はいっ！

source: TEXT_FESEST302_02422_ACTOR02422_000_040<tab>Uwaaah! Twelve have mercy! 'Tis a demon bird, risen from the seventh hell to reave my soul! Woe is me! I am...I am undone!
target:
TEXT_FESEST302_02422_ACTOR02422_000_040うわーーーあぁ！
なんだ、なんだー！
わー、チョコボかー、びっくりしたー！

source: TEXT_FESEST302_02422_ACTOR02422_000_041<tab>...Well, how was it? My performance, that is. I'm an aspiring actor, you see, and I joined in Hatching<var 1F /var>tide so I could practice my craft. Next time, I believe I'll explore...denial. Yes, just a hint to add depth to the character's vulnerabilities.
target:
TEXT_FESEST302_02422_ACTOR02422_000_041……どう？　僕の「驚き」の演技。
このお祭りに協力したら、演技力に磨きがかかると思ってさ。
より素晴らしい役者になるために、参加してるんだ！

source: TEXT_FESEST302_02422_ACTOR02422_000_042<tab>Ah, but before I forget, this shock egg's for you. And with that, it's back to rehearsing for me.
target:
TEXT_FESEST302_02422_ACTOR02422_000_042それじゃ、「」をあげるよ。
さあ、もっと「驚き」の演技を練習するぞー！

source: TEXT_FESEST302_02422_MAN02422_000_045<tab>Gah! S-Seven hells, I swear it's worse when you know it's comin'. So, er, what happens now? The chocobo lays a gemstone?
target:
TEXT_FESEST302_02422_MAN02422_000_045おぉ、びっくりした！
……さあ、これでチョコボが宝石を産むんだろ？
俺にくれよ！

source: TEXT_FESEST302_02422_MAN02422_000_046<tab>...No? Should've known it was too good to be true. More's the pity─was the main reason I volunteered for this. You can't put much store by dreams, bad as I feel for that Jihli lass.
target:
TEXT_FESEST302_02422_MAN02422_000_046……うーん、産まないか。
やっぱ、あの嬢ちゃんの夢なんて、所詮は夢か。
宝石が産まれるって聞いたから、参加してるのに。

source: TEXT_FESEST302_02422_MAN02422_000_047<tab>Anyroad, here's your shock egg. Gotta hand out as many as I can if I wanna collect my prize.
target:
TEXT_FESEST302_02422_MAN02422_000_047ほらよ、ルール通り「」はくれてやる。
持ってるタマゴを減らさないと、景品も貰えないからな。
もっと配ってこないと。

source: TEXT_FESEST302_02422_WOMAN02422_000_050<tab>Eeeeeek! M-My heart fairly stopped. After so many frights, you think you'd get used to it...
target:
TEXT_FESEST302_02422_WOMAN02422_000_050わぁ！　びっくりしたー！
何度やられてもびっくりしちゃうなぁ。

source: TEXT_FESEST302_02422_WOMAN02422_000_051<tab>But I must say, the egg never ceases to amaze me. How in the world do they make it hover like that?
target:
TEXT_FESEST302_02422_WOMAN02422_000_051このタマゴ、すごく面白い仕掛けだよね！
見ていて飽きないよ。
どうやって浮いてるのかは、わからないけど……。

source: TEXT_FESEST302_02422_WOMAN02422_000_052<tab>Oh, but I owe you a shock egg, for a fine shock rendered. Loud as I scream each time, I find the sensation quite addictive. My thanks, adventurer!
target:
TEXT_FESEST302_02422_WOMAN02422_000_052そうだ、「」をあげなくちゃ！
楽しかったよ、ありがとね！

source: TEXT_FESEST302_02422_NONOTTA_000_055<tab>You seem to have mislaid the egg, adventurer. Pun intended. Talk to Motte, and she'll help you back on it.
target:
TEXT_FESEST302_02422_NONOTTA_000_055冒険者さん、「エッグシステム」から降りちゃった？
モットちゃんに話しかければ、もう一度乗せてくれますぅ～！

source: TEXT_FESEST302_02422_ACTOR02422_000_056<tab>Won't someone launch a shockobo at me already? I'm itching to test out a new variation on a theme of “startled.”
target:
TEXT_FESEST302_02422_ACTOR02422_000_056「チョコボ人形」を出してくれる人、いないかなぁ……。
もっと驚かしてほしくてたまらないんだ！

source: TEXT_FESEST302_02422_MAN02422_000_057<tab>If you're not gonna fire a shockobo at me, bugger off. I've got shock eggs I need to give out.
target:
TEXT_FESEST302_02422_MAN02422_000_057「チョコボ人形」を出してくれないのか？
あれで驚かしてくれないなら、あんたに用はないな。

source: TEXT_FESEST302_02422_WOMAN02422_000_058<tab>Oh, where's my next shock coming from? The suspense is too much to bear!
target:
TEXT_FESEST302_02422_WOMAN02422_000_058私、「チョコボ人形」を見たいの！
誰か早く、驚かしてくれないかなぁ。

source: TEXT_FESEST302_02422_NONOTTA_000_060<tab>Ah, welcome back. Have your startling efforts met with success, and you have the shock eggs to show for it?
target:
TEXT_FESEST302_02422_NONOTTA_000_060エグ、エグ、エ～グ、エッグラホ♪
冒険者さん、おかえりなさい！
それじゃ、「」を3つ、渡してくれますぅ～？

source: TEXT_FESEST302_02422_NONOTTA_000_061<tab>Three eggs, precisely as ordered! You've done well, my friend.
target:
TEXT_FESEST302_02422_NONOTTA_000_061うんうん、タマゴがきっちり3つ。
ちゃんと驚かせたみたいでよかったですぅ～！

source: TEXT_FESEST302_02422_ACTOR02422_000_062<tab>Miss Dreamer! Miss Dreamer!
target: TEXT_FESEST302_02422_ACTOR02422_000_062<tab>おーい、実行委員さーん！

source: TEXT_FESEST302_02422_WOMAN02422_000_063<tab>Hells' bells, that was a shock an' a half! You never mentioned there'd be others out there tryin' to startle us!
target:
TEXT_FESEST302_02422_WOMAN02422_000_063いやぁ、びっくりしたよ！
タマゴ以外にも驚かしてくるやつがいるんだね！

source: TEXT_FESEST302_02422_NONOTTA_000_064<tab>Others? Whatever are you talking about?
target: TEXT_FESEST302_02422_NONOTTA_000_064<tab>えっ、どういうこと？

source: TEXT_FESEST302_02422_MAN02422_000_065<tab>The spriggan ridin' a rock, what else? Fella appeared without warnin' an' gave me the fright of my life. I fair soiled myself!
target:
TEXT_FESEST302_02422_MAN02422_000_065どういうことって、あの大きな石に乗ったスプリガンだよ！
それが突然現れてさ、驚かしてきたんだ。
もう、すごかったぜ！

source: TEXT_FESEST302_02422_ACTOR02422_000_066<tab>I as well! It was all so real and visceral, I didn't even have to act! Joining in the festival was the best decision ever!
target:
TEXT_FESEST302_02422_ACTOR02422_000_066スプリガンまで参加してるなんて、このお祭りはすごいね！
あのスプリガン、グリダニアに向かっていったけど、
街の中でも驚かしに行くのかな！

source: TEXT_FESEST302_02422_WOMAN02422_000_067<tab>Hear, hear! Ah, but the exquisite flush of the fright begins to fade. I'll need another one soon. Perhaps if I were to follow the spriggan to Gridania... Oh, and thank you, Miss Dreamer! I haven't had this much fun in a long while!
target:
TEXT_FESEST302_02422_WOMAN02422_000_067かもしれないね！
いやー、それにしても驚いた！
すごく楽しかったよ、ありがとう！

source: TEXT_FESEST302_02422_NONOTTA_000_068<tab>Er...y-you're welcome?
target:
TEXT_FESEST302_02422_NONOTTA_000_068えっ、あー……
た、楽しんでくれて、よかったですぅ～！

source: TEXT_FESEST302_02422_NONOTTA_000_069<tab>Um, adventurer? Rock-riding spriggans aren't part of the plan, and I have a terrible feeling about this. We may have need of your aid beyond simply startling townsfolk.
target:
TEXT_FESEST302_02422_NONOTTA_000_069……冒険者さん、ノノッタたち、
大きな石に乗ったスプリガンのことなんて知らないですぅ～。
なんだか、トラブルの予感……もうちょっと、協力してくれる？

source: TEXT_FESEST302_02422_MOTTE_000_075<tab>How fares the startling effort, adventurer? When you've collected three shock eggs, be sure to take them to Nonotta.
target:
TEXT_FESEST302_02422_MOTTE_000_075冒険者さん、「」は貰えてる？
3つ集まったら、「ノノッタ」に渡しにいってね！
